recipe.title: N'awlins Butter Beans with Andouille
ingredients: 3 turkey (or chicken) andouille sausage links (about 3 oz each), sliced on an angle
1 can (16 oz) large butter beans (or lima beans)
instructions: In a medium stockpot, bring all ingredients to a boil. Salt and pepper to taste. Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes or until the beans are tender and the sausage has shrunk to small disks. Serve hot.
